basic.description:
A study of the main works and currents of medieval Spanish literature from A.D. 1000 to 1500.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (36S;84P)
basic.subject: SPAN
basic.title: Literatura medieval española

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite     SPAN261 or SPAN381.
Corequisites    (SPAN301 and SPAN302) or (SPAN303 and SPAN304).
